job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Research the latest techniques and methods in deep learning and natural language processing to improve the dialog system across different use cases, including multimodal conversation, long-term memory, chitchat, intent recognition and others
     * Work closely with stakeholders from product, engineering, content policy on a long-term improvement over the dialog system use cases, for both external release and internal use cases
     * Introduce new techniques, tools, and architecture that improve the quality, performance, latency, throughput, and efficiency of our models
     * Create products that are used by millions of Snapchatters
job_details.full_text:
Machine Learning Engineer, NLP

* Research the latest techniques and methods in deep learning and natural language processing to improve the dialog system across different use cases, including multimodal conversation, long-term memory, chitchat, intent recognition and others
     * Work closely with stakeholders from product, engineering, content policy on a long-term improvement over the dialog system use cases, for both external release and internal use cases
     * Introduce new techniques, tools, and architecture that improve the quality, performance, latency, throughput, and efficiency of our models
     * Create products that are used by millions of Snapchatters

profile_classification.rationale: The role emphasizes research into deep learning and NLP techniques for improving dialog systems, including model quality, performance, and efficiency. While it involves building products for millions, the core focus is on algorithmic improvement and model enhancement, aligning with the ML Engineer profile's emphasis on predictive modeling and productionizing prototypes.

phrases: Research the latest techniques and methods in deep learning and natural language processing to improve the dialog system
improve the quality, performance, latency, throughput, and efficiency of our models
job_tasks.justification: These phrases directly relate to the core process of creating, training, and adapting machine learning models, specifically focusing on deep learning and NLP for dialog systems, and optimizing their performance metrics.

phrases: Create products that are used by millions of Snapchatters
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the development of user-facing products, which falls under traditional software engineering tasks required to integrate AI features into applications.

phrases: Work closely with stakeholders from product, engineering, content policy on a long-term improvement over the dialog system use cases, for both external release and internal use cases
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the need to understand business context and translate needs into technical requirements by collaborating with various stakeholders on dialog system improvements for different use cases.

phrases: Introduce new techniques, tools, and architecture that improve the quality, performance, latency, throughput, and efficiency of our models
job_tasks.justification: While not explicitly MLOps, introducing new techniques and architectures to improve model performance, latency, and efficiency in a production context implies an understanding and application of operational considerations for deployed models.

technologies.phrase: deep learning and natural language processing

soft_skills.phrase: Work closely with stakeholders from product, engineering, content policy
Research the latest techniques and methods
improve the dialog system across different use cases, including multimodal conversation, long-term memory, chitchat, intent recognition and others
Introduce new techniques, tools, and architecture
